place.name: WOOLVERTON
place.gazetteerText: WOOLVERTON, a parish in Frome district, Somerset; 4 miles N of Frome r. station. Post town, Beckington, under Bath. Acres, with Chatley-Hill, 736. Real property, with Road, £4,884. Pop. of W. alone, 171. Houses, 38. The manor belongs to Mrs. Jones. The living is a rectory, annexed to Road. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
